[Portrait]Mysterious Voice[Dialog]
You'll not enter the undercroft
on my watch. The way is shut.{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>[Dialog]
Who speaks? Reveal yourself!{END}

Naive as ever, I see.{END}

[Portrait]Argath[Dialog]
Ha! To think my luck so fair that
we would chance to meet again!{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>[Dialog]
Argath! How did-I thought
you for dead!{END}

Dead? Oh, <Ramza>...
Your mind's as common as
your friends!
I did not -die-, I was reborn!
Chosen by a greater power!

I did not fall before, nor shall I
here. That fate belongs to you!{END}

You've no hope in this fight.{END}

Come! Let us kill these maggots!{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>[Dialog]
So, your soul is bartered as well.
Your grandsire would be proud.{END}

[Portrait]Argath[Dialog]
How dare you!

You, pampered and coddled from your
earliest days!

What do you know of our affairs?
Of being made to toil for another's
pleasure, near without reward?
Being trod upon even by peasant filth,
struggling endlessly to rise back to your
feet-what do you know of this?
I'll purge this kingdom of all who once
dared look down on me! There is no
place in the world for the meager!{END}

You'll do nothing of the sort!{END}

[Portrait]Argath[Dialog]
How do you intend to stop me? You who  
cannot even defend his own sister!
A son of House Beoulve, and meek as a
butterfly all the same! Ha ha ha!{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>[Dialog]
Guard your tongue!{END}

Worry not, I'll soon send your dear sister
beyond the veil to be with you!

Just as I did Delita's!{END}

[Portrait]Argath[Dialog]
Why!? Why must I ever be
denied my due...by them!?{END}

[Portrait]Argath[Dialog]
M-Mother...
Help...me...{END}

[Portrait]<Ramza>[Dialog]
I'm on my way, Alma!{END}
